sentences.english: The method is applicable to the manufacturers for extracting iodine with phosphate ore.
sentences.chinese: 適用於從磷礦石提取碘的生產企業。

sentences.english: Residual amounts of iron and aluminum dilute the phosphate content.
sentences.chinese: 殘採的鐵鋁降低了磷礦的含量。

sentences.english: Phosphoric acid was selected as bond to make phosphate rock powder into ball material.
sentences.chinese: 研究選用磷酸作粘結劑，使碎磷礦粉粘結成型。

sentences.english: Industrial-grade phosphoric acid was produced by using mid-low-grade phosphate rock.
sentences.chinese: 利用中低品位磷礦製取工業級磷酸。

sentences.english: The Dayukou project met with a great difficulty in deciding on the source of secondary rock.
sentences.chinese: 大峪口工程在確定二次磷礦源時遇到了很大困難。

sentences.english: Flotation is used for Florida and Kola rock.
sentences.chinese: 浮選操作法用於佛羅里達磷礦和科拉磷礦。

sentences.english: Flotation is used for Florida and Kola rock.
sentences.chinese: 浮選操作法用於佛羅里達磷礦和科拉磷礦。

sentences.english: The problems in the beneficiation of phosphorite ores and countermeasures are presented.
sentences.chinese: 指出了磷礦石選礦中存在的問題並給出瞭解決對策。

sentences.english: The phosphate also acts as a binder.
sentences.chinese: 磷礦還起膠結劑的作用。

sentences.english: Chemical beneficiation is an effective method for treating refractory phosphate ores.
sentences.chinese: 化學選礦是處理難選磷礦石的有效方法。

sentences.english: This is illustrated by citing a case of purchase of bulldozers in Kunyang Phosphate Mine.
sentences.chinese: 以昆陽磷礦購買推土機爲例作了說明。

sentences.english: Phosphate rock is the major raw material in the production of Phosphate fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 磷礦是生產磷肥的主要原料。

sentences.english: Phosphate bulk carrier off the cost of Nauru at sunset.
sentences.chinese: 在夕陽中駛離瑙魯海灘的散裝磷礦石船。

sentences.english: Bowl mills have not been widely employed for phosphate rock to date.
sentences.chinese: 鉢狀磨礦機至今尚未廣泛應用於磷礦的磨碎。

sentences.english: The calcium carbonate content of phosphate rock determines the pore structure.
sentences.chinese: 磷礦中碳酸鈣的含量決定了磷礦的毛細孔結構。

sentences.english: The calcium carbonate content of phosphate rock determines the pore structure.
sentences.chinese: 磷礦中碳酸鈣的含量決定了磷礦的毛細孔結構。
